abstract: Turkish-Allied pact and Italy's mil power discussed
snippet: Reports from Rome indicate that another dreadful deadline in the war may be approaching. June has been set, according to these predictions, as the month for the Italian entry into the war on the German side; by some, even the date--Tuesday, June 4...

headline.main: IF ITALY FIGHTS; THE ITALIAN AIR FORCE

lead_paragraph: Reports from Rome indicate that another dreadful deadline in the war may be approaching. June has been set, according to these predictions, as the month for the Italian entry into the war on the German side; by some, even the date--Tuesday, June 4--has been mentioned.
